mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project ( project_name, project_type, project_class, project_start_date, project_end_date, organization_id, client_id, project_manager, project_leader, note, sales, version_no ) VALUES ( #{projectName}, #{projectType}, #{projectClass}, #{projectStartDate}, #{projectEndDate}, #{organizationId}, #{clientId}, #{projectManager}, #{projectLeader}, #{note}, #{sales}, 1 )
